title: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart when the localization key is left blank.
EB: In the properties file, when the localization key is left blank but a valid value is provided, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set the externalized text in the chart title. 2. Leave the localization key blank and verify that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
